title: Kim Kardashian flaunts her show-stopping curves as she hits NYC with Kanye West
text:

Kim Kardashian has just celebrated turning 39.

And the reality star looked incredible when she joined her husband Kanye West , 42, at Fashion Group International's 2019 Night of Stars at Cipriani Wall Street, in New York City on Thursday.

The Keeping Up With The Kardashian star turned heads in a sparkling silver skirt and top which clung to every inch of her enviably-toned curves.

Kim put the emphasis on her hourglass shape as her skirt was cinched in at the waistline and her one-shoulder top accentuated her cleavage.

(Image: SplashNews.com)

(Image: GC Images)

(Image: GC Images)

In her typical minimalist style, the Kardashian complemented her beauty with a natural make-up palette and nude lipstick.

The American beauty arranged her waist-length raven-coloured mane in soft waves that bounced off her curvy frame while she sauntered about at the event.

Kim and Kanye were totally loved-up as the rapper pulled his wife closer to him by placing his hand securely around her slender waistline.

(Image: SplashNews.com)

(Image: GC Images)

(Image: GC Images)

Their big outing comes as Kanye's new album is just around the corner but it seems the people who worked on it weren't having the best time.

The Jesus Walks rapper has revealed that he banned his staff from having sex before marriage while they helped created his new material.

He claimed it would help his team be more focused and make the album, called Jesus Is King, a success.

(Image: GC Images)

(Image: GC Images)

Kanye said he'd been exposed to porn from a young age and was addicted to sex after his mum died in 2007.

Speaking to Zane Lowe for his Apple Music Beats 1 show, Kanye explained: "There were times where I was asking people not to have premarital sex while they were working on the album.

"There were times where I went to people that were working on other projects and said, can you just work and focus on this? I thought if we could all focus and fast - families who pray together stay together."

His mum Donda died at the age of 58 after undergoing plastic surgery.

Kanye compared his addiction to sex to drug addicts, as he admitted it helped him cope with his grief.

He said: "Some people drown themselves in drugs, and I drown myself in my addiction: sex."
description: Kim has just turned 39 and she looks hot off the runway when she headed out for a night out in New York
